Owlhawk saw the Maximals gathering below and opened his comm.

Owlhawk:  Follow me I'll lead you to them.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Blackfang watched silently Owlhawk, he studied the bot quietly.
> 
> Blackfang: The predacons are currently engaged in heavy combat, 
sir. 
> (He turned to Rodimus) From what I gather, Talos is not the leader 
> anymore. I will follow you, Rodimus Prime, but I must advise 
caution 
> here. There is amother group on this planet and we know nothing of 
> them. Just as they are hostile to the Predacons, they may be 
hostile 
> to us too. I will abide by your decision, though.
>
